testcase.title: "Server encountered an internal error" is displayed for a specific complex query with SAME operator.

steps.title: I select collection "Web of Science Core Collection"
I select search "Advanced Search"

substeps.message: Text of textInput Search Term is .

Text of textInput Search Term is AD=((tech univ Denmark) SAME (charlottenlund OR silkeborg OR nyko*bing)) OR AD=(((dtuaqua OR (danish shellfish*) OR (dansk skaldyr*)) OR (dtu SAME aqua) OR ((natl inst aqua*) OR (inst aquat* resources) OR (div aquat* resources)) SAME Denmark) OR (n sea res ctr) OR (n sea ctr) OR (danish inst fish*) OR (natl inst marine resources) OR (tech univ aqua) OR (aquaculture sec*) SAME (charlottenlund OR silkeborg OR hirtshals OR lyngby OR nyko*bing)) OR (DO=(10.1002/etc.3513)).

textInput Search Term  'AD=((tech univ Denmark) SAME (charlottenlund OR silkeborg OR nyko*bing)) OR AD=(((dtuaqua OR (danish shellfish*) OR (dansk skaldyr*)) OR (dtu SAME aqua) OR ((natl inst aqua*) OR (inst aquat* resources) OR (div aquat* resources)) SAME Denmark) OR (n sea res ctr) OR (n sea ctr) OR (danish inst fish*) OR (natl inst marine resources) OR (tech univ aqua) OR (aquaculture sec*) SAME (charlottenlund OR silkeborg OR hirtshals OR lyngby OR nyko*bing)) OR (DO=(10.1002/etc.3513))' text was entered.
Search finished with no error message

steps.title: I perform search by query "AD=((tech univ Denmark) SAME (charlottenlund OR silkeborg OR nyko*bing)) OR AD=(((dtuaqua OR (danish shellfish*) OR (dansk skaldyr*)) OR (dtu SAME aqua) OR ((natl inst aqua*) OR (inst aquat* resources) OR (div aquat* resources)) SAME Denmark) OR (n sea res ctr) OR (n sea ctr) OR (danish inst fish*) OR (natl inst marine resources) OR (tech univ aqua) OR (aquaculture sec*) SAME (charlottenlund OR silkeborg OR hirtshals OR lyngby OR nyko*bing)) OR (DO=(10.1002/etc.3513))" on page "Advanced Search"
search "Advanced Search" is performed correctly
